attributes.action: Allow driving lessons and tests to continue in any new lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Whilst it has yet to be confirmed, another national lockdown appears to be likely, but the government have ruled out closing educational settings. Driving lessons are also a form of education, and given people will be avoiding public transport due to the greater risk, it is safer for people to drive. Very , very few coronavirus infections are acquired through driving lessons and so they should not be stopped.
attributes.background: Driving lessons and tests, including theory and practical tests, should be allowed to continue under lockdown

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557462
